unnormalised: Scholarship portals – are they actually helpful or just another online thing to wade through? As a final-year student at IIT Delhi (struggling with placements, tbh!), I've been digging deep to find ways to lessen the education loan burden. Scholarship portals came up a lot.
normalised: Scholarship portals – are they actually helpful or just another online thing to wade through? As a final-year student at I I T Delhi (struggling with placements, to be honest!), I've been digging deep to find ways to lessen the education loan burden. Scholarship portals came up a lot.

unnormalised: Has anyone actually had good experiences finding scholarships through them? Like, ones that are legitimate and not just asking for your Aadhar card details and selling them off? I've seen a bunch promising scholarships from NGOs and foundations, but filtering the real from the fake feels like navigating the Mumbai monsoon.
normalised: Has anyone actually had good experiences finding scholarships through them? Like, ones that are legitimate and not just asking for your Aadhar card details and selling them off? I've seen a bunch promising scholarships from N G O s and foundations, but filtering the real from the fake feels like navigating the Mumbai monsoon.

unnormalised: I’m talking about platforms that genuinely help students like my friend, Priya, who needs funding for her MBA at IIM Ahmedabad. Are there portals that cater specifically to postgraduate studies in India?
normalised: I’m talking about platforms that genuinely help students like my friend, Priya, who needs funding for her M B A at I I M Ahmedabad. Are there portals that cater specifically to postgraduate studies in India?

unnormalised: I remember watching "3 Idiots," and even Rancho had financial worries! So, knowing the reality, what are some trustworthy scholarship portals for Indian students, offering scholarships specifically for Indian students, not international ones which want you to study abroad? Any recommendations? Has anyone used a particular portal and actually received money? Any insights appreciated!
normalised: I remember watching "three Idiots," and even Rancho had financial worries!
